title: Soulbreaker Greatsword
content:
Soulbreaker Greatsword Rare 4~17 Damage 2d6 +1 Slashing+1d4 Psychic (Conditional) Githborn Psionic Weapon: When wielded by a githyanki this weapon deals an additional 1~4 Psychic damage. Seldom Caught Unawares: You gain a +2 bonus to Initiative Rolls. Weapon Enchantment +1 Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks: The Sharp metal whispers to you. Pleading. Cursing... Echoes of slain foes. Greatsword Two-Handed 2.7 380

Soulbreaker Greatsword

2d6 +1 Slashing+1d4 Psychic (Conditional)

Githborn
